journey: My journey into the world of development began with curiosity and has evolved into a passionate pursuit of creating meaningful digital experiences. I believe in the power of technology to solve real-world problems and make life better for people.
experience: I have over 4 years of experience in software development, working across diverse projects and technologies.
learning: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community. I'm always eager to learn and grow, staying updated with the latest trends and best practices in web development.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science

whatIDo.title: Backend Development
